DOC.brief_summary: The U.S . Surgeon General recommend peer counsel support breastfeed become core service Supplemental Nutrition Program Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) . As 2008 , 50 percent WIC client receive service local WIC agency offer peer counseling . Little known effectiveness peer counsel program . Randomized control trial peer counsel intervention among low-income woman U.S. show increase breastfeed initiation duration , doubtful level support provide could scale service WIC client nationally . The investigator test whether telephone peer counsel program among WIC participant could increase breastfeed initiation , duration exclusivity .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Varied Intensities Breastfeeding Peer Support Duration Breastfeeding Among Oregon WIC Participants
